update guide set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document_id = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appendix = #{appendix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policy_plan = #{policyPlan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industrial_distribution = #{industrialDistribution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_field = #{investField,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invest_suggestion = #{investSuggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, other_requirement = #{otherRequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from guide where del_flag = 0 LIMIT #{startLine},#{pageSize}
select * from guide where del_flag = 0 and document_id like concat('%',#{documentId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')
select * from guide where del_flag = 0 and title like concat('%',#{title,jdbcType = VARCHAR},'%')

mapper.update: update guide set del_flag=#{guideId} where id=#{guideId}
mapper.select: select * from guide where del_flag=0 order by id desc
